      Constructor Description
      Base​(double x, double y, double width, double height)

      • inBounds

        public int inBounds​(int width,
                    int height)
        Checks to see if the plane's position is still within the window
        Parameters:
        width - width of the screen
        height - height of the screen
        Returns:
        returns an int that shows where it exceeds bounds or if it's in. (0- in bounds, 1- right side, 2- Left side, 3- Below, 4- Above)
